      public void setBoard(int[][] board)
      Set sudoku board, numbers 1-9 are fixed values, 0 is unsolved.

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if board is invalid, e.g. not 9x9

      Gets the current state of the Sudoku board.
      Specified by:
      getBoard in interface game.SudokuSolver
      Returns:
      a copy of the 9x9 array representing the Sudoku board

    • isLegal

      public boolean isLegal(int row, int col, int num)
      Checks if placing a digit is valid at the specified position on the current Sudoku board.
      Specified by:
      isLegal in interface game.SudokuSolver
      Parameters:
      row - the row index where the digit is to be placed
      col - the column index where the digit is to be placed
      num - the digit to be checked for validity (1-9)
      Returns:
      true if placing the digit at the given position is legal, false otherwise
